Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28322 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.0.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-28322 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.0.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.0.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-28322
